WATERTOWN, N.Y. (WWNY) - Jefferson County Public Health reports 20 new COVID-19 cases Saturday. The countys total now sits at 592.

articles.author: Kelly Dean
articles.title: Family, community mourn loss of Ballard Co. teen who died from COVID-19 - WSAZ
articles.description: Family and the community described Alexa Rose Veit as a “social butterfly.” She was born in February 2005 with down syndrome and at 14 was diagnosed with Leukemia. A year later, Veit was considered to be in remission from cancer.
articles.content:
BALLARD COUNTY, Ky. (WBKO) - On Wednesday, Governor Beshear announced a 15-year-old from Ballard County with underlying health conditions passed away due to COVID-19.

articles.title: Saturday report shows 3395 new coronavirus cases in Utah, 14 deaths - KSL.com
articles.description: That brings Utah to 173,979 total confirmed cases and 787 coronavirus-related deaths since the pandemic began.
articles.content: SALT LAKE CITY One day after setting yet another record for new cases reported in a single day, the Utah Department of Health is reporting another 3,395 test-confirmed cases of COVID-19 and 14 deaths… [+4333 chars]
